recipesJson.name: KRUCIAL PULSAR CLONE
recipesJson.author: KRUCIAL
recipesJson.description: This is profile is slightly sour lemon lime up front with a hint of a peach note in the middle and sweet meringue on the exhale. This seems to be the favorite for most vapers out of the Space Jam line and I can see why. Its a great sweet and sour candy fruit experience, great for spring. It has a medium throat hit on a shake n vape but its gone after a couple draws and will steep out after a couple days. Im not a huge fan of menthol but I would say that this recipe would make a good candidate for adding just a little bit. Menthol is not in the original profile and neither is raspberry but in testing I found that 2 drops per 30ml of INW Raspberry adds another layer and works very well in this mix. So there you have mix it up, enjoy, and never have to buy Pulsar by Space Jam ever again.

reviews.text: I enjoyed this but it was a bit throaty, had to lower the lemon lime and it made it better
This is really good, fucks up your coils really bad, but its worth it

When I first saw juicy peach, as someone that gets a bad throat hit from it, I shuddered. But I mixed this anyway and boy am I glad I did! I get zero throat hit from this juice, I don't get much peach for that matter, I get more of the candy peach ring notes, helping to give more of the candy profile to the lemon and lime. It's sweet but not too sweet. Reminds me of downing a handful of yellow and green sour patch kids. Very good work here, I imagine I will be vaping this a lot throughout spring and summer
This is great.  Thank you for posting and sharing.

Give up outfielders cuz this one's out of the park! A very nice sweet and tart profile my tastebuds thoroughly enjoy.  Excellent work Barrett! Really dig your butter almond custard as well! Doing good things you are.
